11#ifndef MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_MATCHED_FILTER_H_
12#define MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_MATCHED_FILTER_H_
13
14#include <stddef.h>
15
16#include <vector>
17
18#include "api/array_view.h"
19#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/aec3_common.h"
20#include "rtc_base/system/arch.h"
21
22namespace webrtc {
23
24class ApmDataDumper;
25struct DownsampledRenderBuffer;
26
27namespace aec3 {
28
29#if defined(WEBRTC_HAS_NEON)
30
31// Filter core for the matched filter that is optimized for NEON.
32void MatchedFilterCore_NEON(size_t x_start_index,
33 float x2_sum_threshold,
34 float smoothing,
35 rtc::ArrayView<const float> x,
36 rtc::ArrayView<const float> y,
37 rtc::ArrayView<float> h,
38 bool* filters_updated,
39 float* error_sum);
40
41#endif
42
43#if defined(WEBRTC_ARCH_X86_FAMILY)
44
45// Filter core for the matched filter that is optimized for SSE2.
46void MatchedFilterCore_SSE2(size_t x_start_index,
47 float x2_sum_threshold,
48 float smoothing,
49 rtc::ArrayView<const float> x,
50 rtc::ArrayView<const float> y,
51 rtc::ArrayView<float> h,
52 bool* filters_updated,
53 float* error_sum);
54
55// Filter core for the matched filter that is optimized for AVX2.
56void MatchedFilterCore_AVX2(size_t x_start_index,
57 float x2_sum_threshold,
58 float smoothing,
59 rtc::ArrayView<const float> x,
60 rtc::ArrayView<const float> y,
61 rtc::ArrayView<float> h,
62 bool* filters_updated,
63 float* error_sum);
64
65#endif
66
67// Filter core for the matched filter.
68void MatchedFilterCore(size_t x_start_index,
69 float x2_sum_threshold,
70 float smoothing,
71 rtc::ArrayView<const float> x,
72 rtc::ArrayView<const float> y,
73 rtc::ArrayView<float> h,
74 bool* filters_updated,
75 float* error_sum);
76
77} // namespace aec3
78
79// Produces recursively updated cross-correlation estimates for several signal
80// shifts where the intra-shift spacing is uniform.
81class MatchedFilter {
82 public:
83 // Stores properties for the lag estimate corresponding to a particular signal
84 // shift.
85 struct LagEstimate {
86 LagEstimate() = default;
87 LagEstimate(float accuracy, bool reliable, size_t lag, bool updated)
88 : accuracy(accuracy), reliable(reliable), lag(lag), updated(updated) {}
89
90 float accuracy = 0.f;
91 bool reliable = false;
92 size_t lag = 0;
93 bool updated = false;
94 };
95
96 MatchedFilter(ApmDataDumper* data_dumper,
97 Aec3Optimization optimization,
98 size_t sub_block_size,
99 size_t window_size_sub_blocks,
100 int num_matched_filters,
101 size_t alignment_shift_sub_blocks,
102 float excitation_limit,
103 float smoothing_fast,
104 float smoothing_slow,
105 float matching_filter_threshold);
106
107 MatchedFilter() = delete;
108 MatchedFilter(const MatchedFilter&) = delete;
109 MatchedFilter& operator=(const MatchedFilter&) = delete;
110
111 ~MatchedFilter();
112
113 // Updates the correlation with the values in the capture buffer.
114 void Update(const DownsampledRenderBuffer& render_buffer,
115 rtc::ArrayView<const float> capture,
116 bool use_slow_smoothing);
117
118 // Resets the matched filter.
119 void Reset();
120
121 // Returns the current lag estimates.
122 rtc::ArrayView<const MatchedFilter::LagEstimate> GetLagEstimates() const {
123 return lag_estimates_;
124 }
125
126 // Returns the maximum filter lag.
127 size_t GetMaxFilterLag() const {
128 return filters_.size() * filter_intra_lag_shift_ + filters_[0].size();
129 }
130
131 // Log matched filter properties.
132 void LogFilterProperties(int sample_rate_hz,
133 size_t shift,
134 size_t downsampling_factor) const;
135
136 private:
137 ApmDataDumper* const data_dumper_;
138 const Aec3Optimization optimization_;
139 const size_t sub_block_size_;
140 const size_t filter_intra_lag_shift_;
141 std::vector<std::vector<float>> filters_;
142 std::vector<LagEstimate> lag_estimates_;
143 std::vector<size_t> filters_offsets_;
144 const float excitation_limit_;
145 const float smoothing_fast_;
146 const float smoothing_slow_;
147 const float matching_filter_threshold_;
148};
149
150} // namespace webrtc
151
152#endif // MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_MATCHED_FILTER_H_
